document.full_text: mayor-elect rahm emanuel of chicago announced monday that jean-claude brizard, the embattled schools superintendent in rochester, would be the next chicago public schools chief executive.
document.title: midwest: illinois: schools chief is chosen
lines_and_colors: mayor-elect rahm emanuel of chicago announced monday that jean-claude brizard, the embattled schools superintendent in rochester, would be the next chicago public schools chief executive.
